



```{r}

library(agricolae)
library(tidybayes)
library(tidyverse)

ticks <- read_csv("../0_Data_files/ticks-targets.csv.gz")

```


Breaking down the data
```{r}
view(ticks)

aa_ticks<- ticks%>% select(siteID, plotID, ambloyomma_americanum)

is_ticks<- ticks%>% select(siteID, plotID, ixodes_scapularis)

```

ANOVA for aa_ticks
```{r}
aa_ticks<- aa_ticks %>% drop_na(ambloyomma_americanum)

str(aa_ticks)

aa_ticks$siteID<- factor(aa_ticks$siteID)

str(aa_ticks)

mod1.lm<-lm(ambloyomma_americanum ~ plotID + siteID, data= aa_ticks)

mod1.av<-aov(mod1.lm)

summary(mod1.av)

tukey.test<-TukeyHSD(mod1.av)

tukey.test

plot(tukey.test)

summary(tukey.test)

```

ANOVA for is_ticks data
```{r}

is_ticks<- is_ticks %>% drop_na(ixodes_scapularis)

str(is_ticks)

is_ticks$siteID<- factor(is_ticks$siteID)

str(is_ticks)

mod1.lm<-lm(ixodes_scapularis ~ plotID + siteID, data= is_ticks)

mod1.av<-aov(mod1.lm)

summary(mod1.av)

tukey.test<-TukeyHSD(mod1.av)

tukey.test

plot(tukey.test)

summary(tukey.test)


```
